citeinfo.origin: Indiana Commission for Higher Education (ICHE)(Data source)
citeinfo.title: SCHOOLS_HIGHER_EDUCATION_ICHE_IN: Colleges and Universities in Indiana (Indiana Commission for Higher Education, Point Shapefile)
citeinfo.othercit: Street addresses of colleges and universities (2- and 4-year public institutions and independent institutions) were obtained from a Web site of the Indiana Commission for Higher Education (http://www.che.state.in.us/schools/interactivelist.shtml). Personnel of the Indiana University Architect's Office used geocoding to create a point shapefile. Personnel of the Indiana Geological Survey used ESRI ArcMap 9.2 to edit the locations of thirteen (13) records.

descript.abstract: SCHOOLS_HIGHER_EDUCATION_ICHE_IN is a point shapefile showing the locations of 76 colleges and universities (including 2- and 4-year public institutions and independent institutions) listed on a directory obtained from the Indiana Commission for Higher Education (http://www.che.state.in.us/schools/interactivelist.shtml).
descript.purpose: This data set was compiled to create a GIS layer showing locations of colleges and universities in Indiana.

timeperd.current: 2007 Indiana Commission for Higher Education Web site

idinfo.native: ESRI ArcGIS version 9.2 shapefile format, approximately 280 Kb

attracc.attraccr: Street addresses for colleges and universities were obtained from the Web site of the Indiana Commission for Higher Education and are assumed to be accurate. Geocoding was performed by personnel of the Indiana University Architect's Office. Editing of some locations was performed by personnel of the Indiana Geological Survey using the "Editor" tool in ESRI ArcMap version 9.2, together with information obtained from Google searches, MapQuest (http://www.mapquest.com/maps/), and inspection of aerial photographs of the 2005 Indiana Orthophotography Project.

dataqual.logic: No checks for logical consistency were made.
dataqual.complete: All colleges and universities listed by the Indiana Commission for Higher Education have been included.

horizpa.horizpar: Automated geocoding typically produces locations that are generally within several hundred feet of actual locations.

vertacc.vertaccr: The vertical positional accuracy was not a factor in the production of this shapefile.

srcinfo.srccitea: Indiana Commission for Higher Education, Colleges and Universities (http://www.che.state.in.us/schools/interactivelist.shtml)
srcinfo.srccontr: Street addresses of colleges and universities

citeinfo.title: IN_HIGHER_ED_FINAL.shp
citeinfo.othercit: ESRI ArcMap shapefile derived from a directory of colleges and universities obtained from a Web site of the Indiana Commission for Higher Education

srcinfo.srccontr: ESRI ArcMap shapefile showing locations of colleges and universities

procstep.procdesc: Street addresses for colleges and universities were obtained by personnel of the Indiana University Architect's Office from a Web site of the Indiana Commission for Higher Education (http://www.che.state.in.us/schools/interactivelist.shtml). Using geocoding, an ESRI ArcMap shapefile was generated.

cntinfo.cntpos: Director of In-House Projects and Spatial-Project Information

procstep.procdesc: Personnel of the Indiana Geological Survey obtained an ESRI ArcMap shapefile (IN_HIGHER_ED_FINAL.SHP) from personnel of the Indiana University Architect's Office. The shapefile contained a field named "Errors" that indicated that the locations of certain records were uncertain, based on the results of geocoding by personnel of the Indiana University Architect's Office. Using the ESRI ArcMap editing tool, IGS personnel edited the locations of the 13 points that had locational errors, using information gathered from Google searches, Mapquest, and inspection of the color aerial photographs of the 2005 Indiana Orthophotography Project. The following fields were deleted from IN_HIGHER_ED_FINAL.SHP - Street, State_out, Latitude, Longitude, Tract_out, Block_out, Geocoding_, Zip_out, City_out, ID_1, ID, OBJECTID, and Errors. The field named "City" was renamed as "City_IN." The field named "Zone" was renamed as "ZIP." The field named "Address_Ou" was renamed as "Address." A field named "IGS_Edit" was added. The revised shapefile was saved as SCHOOLS_HIGHER_EDUCATION_ICHE_IN.SHP.

This metadata file was pre-parsed and parsed using CNS (Chew and Spit, v. 2.6.1) and MP (Metadata Parser, v. 2.7.1) software written by Peter N. Schweitzer (U.S. Geological Survey). The errors generated by MP were all addressed and corrected, except that no values were assigned to "Abscissa_Resolution" and "Ordinate_Resolution."

attr.attrdef: Name of the college or university

attrdomv.udom: Character Field. Types include the following - 2-YR PUBLIC, 4-YR PUBLIC, and INDEPENDENT.

attr.attrdef: Address of a college or university
City in which the college or university is located
Zip code of college or university
Was the record edited by personnel of the Indiana Geological Survey?

edom.edomvd: Yes, the location of the record was edited by personnel of the Indiana Geological Survey.

metainfo.metuc: This metadata file is intended to accompany the data set identified and received from the IGS. It is not to be altered or summarized. IGS does not support secondary distribution. If this data set was received from anyone other than the IGS, this metadata file and the data set it describes may lack integrity.
